config.fallingleaves2.particle_implement:
"Vanilla" refers to the use of a vanilla method, which mods
may use as well to add their own implementation.
"Regular", "Conifer" and "Cherry" are custom implementations.
"Cherry" is close to the vanilla implementation and uses
vanilla textures.
config.fallingleaves2.spawn_breaking_lea: Drop some leaves when this block is hit or decays?
0% turns spawning off, 100% means base spawn rate
text.autoconfig.fallingleaves2.option.al:
Note that vanilla particles are unaffected by:
Leaf Size, Life Span, Needed vertical space, and Wind.
text.autoconfig.fallingleaves2.option.ch:
Changes the vanilla cherry petals spawn rate in factors of 10%, i.e.
5 = 50% (half rate)
10 = 100% (original rate)
20 = 200% (double rate)
text.autoconfig.fallingleaves2.option.co: How many conifer leaves spawn over time
text.autoconfig.fallingleaves2.option.de: Adjusts the spawn rate of leaves which are about to decay.
text.autoconfig.fallingleaves2.option.fa: For Fabric Seasons and Serene Seasons
text.autoconfig.fallingleaves2.option.le: How many leaves spawn over time
Additional block states that drop leaves
After enabling this setting, a restart is required!
Drop some leaves when hitting a block?
text.autoconfig.fallingleaves2.option.ma: When a leaf block decays/turns to air it'll spawn some leaves.
text.autoconfig.fallingleaves2.option.mi: Leaves only fall from a block if there's enough free space below it
text.autoconfig.fallingleaves2.option.pa:
Changes the vanilla Pale Oak leaves spawn rate in factors of 10%, i.e.
5 = 50% (half rate)
10 = 100% (original rate)
20 = 200% (double rate)
text.autoconfig.fallingleaves2.option.re:
Allows the /particle command to be used (in singleplayer).
Can cause issues when hosting LAN servers (e.g. via Essential)
when the client doesn't have Falling Leaves installed.
Changing this setting requires a restart.
text.autoconfig.fallingleaves2.option.sn: How many snowflakes fall from snowy trees over time
text.autoconfig.fallingleaves2.option.st: Leaves will not spawn inside this radius around the player.
text.autoconfig.fallingleaves2.option.us: This applies to the "Regular" Particle Implementation
text.autoconfig.fallingleaves2.option.wi: There's always some amount of wind, this option allows for stronger wind
For Fabric Seasons and Serene Seasons
text.autoconfig.fallingleaves2.title: Falling Leaves
